attributes.action: Karen Bradley NI SOS to keep the Cataract clinic at the Lagan Valley Hospital
attributes.background: The Cataract clinic at The Lagan Valley Hospital is due to close and the team disbanded ,with the nearest place being Downpatrick, it's taken year's to train this team, who are carrying out 1000 operations per year,this further downgrades the services at the lagan valley hospital.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

We can’t accept your petition because responsibility for healthcare in Northern Ireland is devolved to the Northern Ireland Assembly. Even though the Northern Ireland Assembly is not sitting, the UK Government and Parliament hasn’t taken back responsibility for this issue.
